inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addAttackBonusVsRacialType('Animal', 20); effect.getBonuses().addArmorClassBonusVsRacialType('Animal', 20); effect.getBonuses().addDamageBonusVsRacialType('Animal', 40); effect.getBonuses().addAttackBonusVsRacialType('Beast', 20); effect.getBonuses().addArmorClassBonusVsRacialType('Beast', 20); effect.getBonuses().addDamageBonusVsRacialType('Beast', 40); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Beast Slayer
description: You become even better in fighting against beasts.  You gain a total of a +20 bonus to Attack, +20 bonus to Defense, and a +40 bonus to Damage when in combat with beast or animal enemy racial types.  This includes many common enemies such as Orcs and Goblins.
